word[0]: be glad/delighted/pleased etc to see the back of somebody/something
definition[0]: to be happy that someone is leaving or because you no longer have to deal with something
example[0]: No, I’m not too upset that he left – in fact, I was glad to see the back of him.
example[1]: I can’t wait to see the back of this project, I can tell you  (=I will be happy when it ends).
